线索-飞镖陷阱: 几乎难以察觉的呻吟声/某物在巨大张力下发出的轻微噼啪声 Almost imperceptible groan/slight crackle of something straining under incredible tension
此处略微变窄，墙壁的石头和质地与其他地方略有不同 It narrows a bit here, walls are of a slightly different stone and character than others
此处石材/灰泥明显有碎裂/刮痕，碎片被扫向墙边 Stone/Mortar is noticeably chipped/scratched here, splinters are swept against the wall
此处地板上有一条锈迹横穿（原为细绳绊线，已向前移动几英尺） Line of rust bisects the floor here (former twine tripwire, moved a few feet ahead)
被气流搅动，一根羽毛的绒毛不合时宜地漂浮在空中 Stirred by wind-currents, an out of place fluff from a Feather floats listlessly in the air
此处有等距排列的孔洞，约在胸部高度，似乎被某物钻出 Something has bored evenly spaced holes, about chest level high here
地面上散布着深色污渍，一些如硬币大小，一处较大，液体曾在此积聚成洼。 Dark stains stipple the ground, some coin sized, and one larger where the liquid puddled
在恰好的角度下，前方有东西在火炬光中闪烁 At just the right angle something glints in torchlight ahead
一支小箭的箭杆上装饰着油亮的黑羽，骄傲地插在墙上 Fletched with oily onyx feathers, the shaft of a small arrow sticks proudly in a wall
这里的石板略微歪斜/凸起，边缘微微翘起，可能会绊到脚趾 Slightly askew/raised, the flagstones here have a slight lip that could stub toes
